name: ARG Zombies - A Mobile Alternate Reality Zombie Game.
blurb: Played in the real world, this iPhone MMORPG pits players against hordes of zombies, and nearby players in turn based combat adventure.

rewards.reward: Keep yourself safe from the first wave, become a SURVIVOR, get \u2022your name in the credits and listed on our website among the few that managed to make it past the initial attacks.
Become a SURVIVOR and receive \u2022early copy of the ARG Zombies beta, and \u2022your name in the credits and on our website among the list of survivors that made it past the first wave of zombies!

Arm and prepare yourself by becoming a COMPETITOR. \u2022Get your name in the credits, receive a \u2022Copy of the game before it is released, and, because it's not safe out there, you'll receive some \u2022extra in-game weapons and armor to get you started!

Want to get in the fight, and earn a little shwag? Become a CONTENDER.  Receive: \u2022EARLY COPY OF THE GAME \u2022In-game STARTER ITEMS, and \u2022All 5 BOSS STICKERS: when scanned in-game these stickers jump directly to the boss encounter. You'll have to defeat them on your own, but you can shortcut around the evil minions and cut straight to the bosses themselves!

Become a SERIOUS SURVIVOR and you will get all items of the previous tiers along with a \u2022Power-up Keychain to give you that extra edge! Carry it with you, and scan the barcode once a day to recieve a temporary boost- crush more zombies to advance faster? or save it to demolish your friends? Either way this item will continue to prove useful in giving you that extra edge over whatever ARG Zombies throws at you!

THE SURVIVOR KIT: This kit has it all! \u2022Credits \u2022Early copy of the game, with \u2022in-game starter items, \u2022Keychain Power-up token \u2022Stickers for all the bosses, AND the \u2022Super Zombie T-shirt that lets you take on your day on the side of the zombies. Other players can scan the barcode on this stylish shirt, and engage in deadly combat against the ominous Super Zombie side boss!

ROAD WARRIOR: Ready to pack up and go at any moment, you will receive everything in \u2022THE SURVIVOR KIT, and an audience designed \u2022SPECIAL WEAPON PACK! The pack will contain 3 special weapons with unique attack animations, which weapons will they be? We don't know yet, we will be taking your feedback to determine what weapons we choose!

CONTRIBUTOR: Have great ideas for ARG Zombies? Contributors will get everything from \u2022THE SURVIVOR KIT and \u2022SPECIAL WEAPON PACK. You will also be allowed behind the scenes to \u2022WRITE A MISSION for the main story line.  Send players to gather resources, kill monsters, or build items- help us weave the story of what it will take to survive in ARG Zombies when you become a CONTRIBUTOR!

SURVIVAL GUIDE: Receive all rewards of previous tiers including \u2022THE SURVIVOR KIT, \u2022SPECIAL WEAPON PACK, and behind the scenes access to \u2022WRITE A MISSION for the story, but you will also be allowed to create a \u2022BUILDING CLEARING MISSION tied to any foursquare location of your choosing. Other players checking in at your location will play through the story, and monsters of your design... let visitors battle your zombie children when they visit your home, let customers slaughter the staff, or employees could slaughter a zombie of their boss when arriving at work! The possibilities are endless, and we can't wait to hear your ideas!

Have a great idea for a roaming monster to inhabit your own city or region of the US? Donate $1000 to earn a CO-PRODUCER credit. Receive everything from \u2022THE SURVIVOR KIT, \u2022SPECIAL WEAPON PACK, you'll be able to \u2022WRITE A MISSION, and create a \u2022BUILDING CLEARING MISSION ... and you will create your own custom \u2022ROAMING SPECIAL MONSTER! Choose which city to place your creation in anywhere in North America! Create a Zombie of yourself, mock an ex, create something totally original... we don't care- you're giving us $1000! Other players will be able to discover and battle your creation only within the area of your choosing! Also receive t-shirt, stickers, and hoodie custom to your monster- so you can roam around battling other ARG Zombies players as your creation!

One backer will get the honor of using their face to model THE SUPER ZOMBIE after.  Everyone who receives a T-shirt will have the pleasure of doing battle with your zombified face on the head of our Super Zombie. To commemorate your contribution you will receive a unique \u2022SUPER ZOMBIE HOODIE (with barcode), and \u202210 SUPER ZOMBIE T-SHIRTS for friends and family-- all covered with your bloody zombified face! This ONE lucky backer will receive everything from \u2022THE SURVIVOR KIT, \u2022SPECIAL WEAPON PACK, you'll be able to \u2022WRITE A MISSION, and create a \u2022BUILDING CLEARING MISSION, and you will receive \u2022CO-PRODUCER CREDIT!

Not satisfied with simple missions and monsters? $1500 buys you \u2022CO-PRODUCER credit, the complete \u2022SURVIVOR KIT, \u2022SPECIAL WEAPON PACK, you'll be able to \u2022WRITE A STORY MISSION, create a \u2022BUILDING CLEARING MISSION, and you will design your own \u2022RARE ELITE BOSS that roams nation wide, and is only accessable at maximum level! Receive a custom t-shirt, hoodie, and stickers all with QR barcodes that lead players to your unique character! Now you can mob around your town AS YOUR RARE ELITE CHARACTER complete with cut-scenes, a backstory, and your own loot table!  Why just survive when you could be a RARE ELITE!

Are you a small business with storefront locations, interested in unique forms of marketing? Are you REALLY INTO ZOMBIE GAMES? $2500 earns you \u2022PRODUCER credit, and all of the rewards of previous tiers. In addition, we will take a location of your choosing and turn it into an \u2022EPIC DUNGEON MISSION, Players will access your dungeon by traveling to the location or scanning your unique barcodes to warp there.  What's lurking inside your home? at work? at the in-laws? You tell us and we will build it all into a clever story with its own unique monsters, backgrounds, cutscenes and loot.

For $5000 we will really pull out all the stops! You will recieve \u2022EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credit, all of the items in the previous tiers, as well as access to limited edition \u2022FALLEN ANGEL character. Login to the game as a Fallen Angel, and begin to bring hellfire and damnation to those around you! You're an angel to our dev team, and so it only makes sense you should play one in the game... an Angel that DESTROYS EVERYTHING!
